name: What's in a Game?
description:
Note: Press "Esc" to return to Main Menu while in game.

The game requires two players: Player 1 and Player 2.

Player 1 interacts with the in-game puzzles while Player 2 has the game's solution manual. One player cannot beat the game without the other.

The players must communicate with one another about what challenges they're facing. Player 1 must describe their surroundings to Player 2 while Player 2 must read the manual and tell them how they're supposed to interact with their environment in order to solve the puzzle. 

Be careful! Things in the game may not behave how you'd expect them to...
